subject: p10933609
History: Altered mental status. High white count. Severe pneumonia. Now with pleuritic chest pain.
Impression: AP chest compared to : Previous mild but asymmetric pulmonary edema continues to improve. The residual opacification in the right upper lobe raises concern for pneumonia. Heart size is normal. There is no pleural effusion.
